I should also make sure to use all the free resources I have at my disposal. Looking at the hand, using The Emperor before discarding the Wild 10s seems like the best approach. After thinking about it further, let's use the Emperor, which creates up to two random Tarot cards.

With that in mind, I need to check the math one last time to make absolutely sure I win. The Stone Card, combined with the chip and mult boosts from the Jokers will be enough.
